about_the_game:
In HARM Weather Warfare, the main character must face threats for which he was completely unprepared. Extreme weather anomalies, such as midsummer blizzards, magnetic storms, ball lightning, daytime auroras, rain turning roads into gusty streams and mysterious electromagnetic discharges, arose from dangerous experiments carried out at the HARM base. Powerful phenomena isolated this cursed place from civilisation, leaving a father and daughter duo stranded.



The dramatic situation for the two protagonists is getting worse by the minute, and a peaceful family trip quickly turns into a fight for survival. To get out of their predicament they will have to create makeshift shelters, forage, hunt and gather materials to make weapons. In HARM Weather Warfare it is not only wild animals and unpredictable forces of nature that will pose a threat, but also crazed cult members.



Escaping this ghastly place will not be as easy as you might think. All escape routes are cut off and the only chance of regaining freedom rests within the abandoned corridors of the HARM base, which puts the entire area at risk.



Although the gameplay focuses on the use of various survival techniques and the ability to adapt to unpredictable conditions, HARM - Weather Warfare is also a fascinating and moving story about training, the search for truth and demanding, parental love.



The fight for life. Do everything to save yourself and your daughter from death in a wilderness forgotten by the world. Fight for survival with all the resources at your disposal while being gripped by a storyline that conveys universal values such as love, trust and sacrifice.

Military secrets. The abandoned HARM base holds secrets that will allow you to escape from death's grip. Beware, however, as the crazy cult that for years has nurtured the mystical powers of the mysterious mountain deals with intruders without mercy.

Improvise. As you explore the remote area you will come across useful tools, equipment and materials. Build, create and combine resources to construct items that will help you continue your journey and fight the forces of nature.

Hunt and fight. The need to survive forces man into extreme behaviour. In HARM Weather Warfare you'll not only have to hunt and hunt for food, you'll also have to face ruthless cultists.

How much can a man bear? The player's complex set of statistics includes indicators such as hunger, thirst, moisture discomfort, sleep deprivation and hypothermia to fully illustrate the struggle for survival in extremely hostile conditions.

Chills. With dynamically changing weather conditions, advanced graphics and a thrilling storyline, the gameplay is extremely intense.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a survival simulator, so you have to hunt animals, but also defend yourself against them, or fight enemies who want to capture or kill you, to survive you also have to kill. But in general, the most important feature of the game is to survive in extreme weather conditions, and killing just to stay alive.
